posts.title: ADA Compliance for Websites: A Small Business Guide
posts.description: Website accessibility isn’t just about doing the right thing — it protects your business and helps you reach more customers. With legal pressure rising and accessibility standards becoming clearer, making your site inclusive is no longer optional.
posts.author: Digital Allies
posts.excerpt: Website accessibility isn’t just about doing the right thing — it protects your business and helps you reach more customers. With legal pressure rising and accessibility standards becoming clearer, making your site inclusive is no longer optional.
